## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATIRT2, IRT2</u>
- **Gene Name:** IRON REGULATED TRANSPORTER 2, iron regulated transporter 2
- **Description:**   iron regulated transporter 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
